description:
Entry-level classic bindings with a step-in design locks with an audible click, so you know when it's securely closed. The wide binding contact area adds torsional rigidity for good power transfer and control. The low-stack height gives you a feel for the snow surface as you power across it.

  • Step-in design automatically clicks closed
  • Low-profile stack height is stable in the glide phase and feels precise as you ski
  • Compatible with IFP mounting plate only
name: Rossignol Tour Classic IFP Bindings - Unisex
